on.from sentence: To study the contribution of each component in the C-GCN model, we ran an ablation study on the TACRED dev set (Table 3). We find that: (1) The entity representations and feedforward layers contribute 1.0 F1. (2) When we remove the dependency structure (i.e., setting A to I), the score drops by 3.2 F1. (3) F1 drops by 10.3 when we remove the feedforward layers, the LSTM component and the dependency structure altogether. (4) Removing the pruning (i.e., using full trees as input) further hurts the result by another 9.7 F1.
